GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.85
GSD.description:
scsi: pm80xx: Do not call scsi_remove_host() in pm8001_alloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.85 by commit 1e434d2687e8bc0b3cdc9dd093c0e9047c0b4add, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 05c6c029a44d9f43715577e33e95eba87f44d285. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: pm80xx: Do not call scsi_remove_host() in pm8001_alloc()
OSV.details:
scsi: pm80xx: Do not call scsi_remove_host() in pm8001_alloc()

This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.85 by commit 1e434d2687e8bc0b3cdc9dd093c0e9047c0b4add, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 05c6c029a44d9f43715577e33e95eba87f44d285. For more details please see the references link.
